channel.title: CVE Feed for Md Abdul Kader -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Md Abdul Kader -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-49631|2024-10-21T11:43:56.355Z -- md%20abdul%20kader -- easy%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Md Abdul Kader Easy Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Easy Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 1.3.0.
